/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApFormImgDDao.selectApFormImgD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'FORM_IMG_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.FORM_IMG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) FORM_IMG_TYP_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.FORM_ID, T.FORM_IMG_TYP_CD, T.IMG_PATH, T.IMG_WDTH, T.IMG_HGHT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'FORM_IMG_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.FORM_IMG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) FORM_IMG_TYP_NM,
FROM AP_FORM_IMG_D T
AND T.FORM_ID = #{formId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.FORM_IMG_TYP_CD = #{formImgTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.FORM_ID, T.FORM_IMG_TYP_CD
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
